tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Sam and the Womp - Bom Bom (Official Video)
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Watch the official video for Bom Bom by Sam and the Womp. Out Now! Buy from iTunes: bit.ly T Shirts: bit.ly Website: www.samandthewomp.com Facebook www.facebook.com Twitter: twitter.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: They stole my dance moves﻿ NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!! :D
she is﻿ hot
make me :-)﻿ xxxx
and the video﻿ is even more horrible
The singer﻿ sounds EXACTLY like Bjork...
HATE﻿ THIS SONG but it's catchy
how the fuck is this song number 1 in the UK ﻿

These people aren't talented because anyone could come up with this. They're not great singers or rappers, they just talk about god know's what without it even making sense. Yes, it's catchy, but genuinely talented singer/songwriters penning songs that actually mean something are worth much more than this, in my opinion. And, for the record, I said﻿ there is no such thing as real music.
song is﻿ good, but video.......
This song was already on youtube more than 1,5 years ago. Bloem de Ligny added some more vocals and it became a hit. Azelia Banks must have﻿ known the song too.
i really dont get﻿ this song
what part of it is terrible?﻿
haha its not the best but gets﻿ your feet moving
IM THE﻿ GAT WID THE BASS AND DRUM GOING AROUND LIKE BOM BOM BOM :D
and i thought cancer was the worst thing to happen to the﻿ world
this video is partically what i﻿ dream :D
haha lol this song really cracks me up. the funny thing is that i have no clue wat she﻿ is saying???
make﻿ me:-).
how is this shit song number 1?﻿
okay, it is kinda catchy? but it still does my﻿ head in ahah.
MAKE THIS AVAILABLE ON MOBILE, PLEASE:(﻿
Your niece drinks 16 pints﻿ of rum?
i like but﻿ i dont like, so confused
